name: Sarah Kuipers
what_you_do: Cultivating resilience and preventing burnout in healthcare and the non-profit sector.
offering: Training to empower staff to navigate pressure with greater ease and avoid burnout.
social_proof: Sarah Kuipers is the #1 best-selling author of The Thriving Giver, a trainer, and lecturer.
business_focus: Providing training and resources to help healthcare and non-profit workers cultivate resilience and prevent burnout.
